featured.text: Her doctor asked her to consult other specialists due to her constant complaints.
In fact, when active people consult him, he usually tells them to just keep exercising.
After several years of physical suffering and near financial ruin from the medical costs, the couple began questioning the treatment after consulting with other patients in online support groups.

definition.en_def: To seek information or advice from someone.
definition.example: I need to consult my doctor before making a decision.
